author: Hive Bot
subject: refactor(testing): Rename tests/ → integration_tests/ to fix namespace collision
body:
PROBLEM ANALYSIS:
Pytest configuration had conflicting 'tests' module namespaces:
- Root tests/ directory (cross-cutting integration tests)
- Package tests/ dirs (hive-async/tests/, hive-db/tests/, etc.)
- App tests/ dirs (ai-planner/tests/, ecosystemiser/tests/, etc.)

- App tests/ dirs (ai-planner/tests/, ecosystemiser/tests/, etc.)

author: Hive Bot
subject: fix(lint): S608 - Add file-level noqa for controlled SQL
body:
database_metadata_service.py uses dynamic SQL with column names from controlled
dicts combined with parameterized queries (?). All values go through placeholders.

author: Hive Bot
subject: fix(lint): F822 - Fix malformed __all__ exports
body:
Fixed missing commas in __all__ lists that caused string concatenation:
- logging.py: Only export functions that actually exist (setup_logging, get_logger)
- hive_bus.py: Separate EcoSystemiserEventBus and get_ecosystemiser_event_bus

- hive_bus.py: Separate EcoSystemiserEventBus and get_ecosystemiser_event_bus
